verses.verse: וַיַּֽעַשׂ־ <S%H6213><s%> And [David] made ל֥וֹ בָתִּ֖ים <S%H1004><s%> him houses בְּעִ֣יר <S%H5892><s%> in the city דָּוִ֑יד <S%H1732><s%> of David וַיָּ֤כֶן <S%H3559><s%> and prepared מָקוֹם֙ <S%H4725><s%> a place לַֽאֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> for the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God וַיֶּט־ <S%H5186><s%> and pitched ל֖וֹ אֹֽהֶל׃ <S%H168><s%> for it a tent

אָ֚ז <S%H227><s%> Then אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> said דָּוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> Then David לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> No לָשֵׂאת֙ <S%H5375><s%> None ought to carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God כִּ֖י <S%H3588><s%> for אִם־ <S%H518><s%> but הַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> but the Levites כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בָ֣ם ׀ בָּחַ֣ר <S%H977><s%> chosen יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> for them hath the LORD לָשֵׂ֞את <S%H5375><s%> to carry אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֧וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD וּֽלְשָׁרְת֖וֹ <S%H8334><s%> and to minister עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> unto him for עוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> ever ס

וַיַּקְהֵ֥ל <S%H6950><s%> together דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> all Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> at יְרֽוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> to Jerusalem לְהַעֲלוֹת֙ <S%H5927><s%> to bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מְקוֹמ֖וֹ <S%H4725><s%> unto his place אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which הֵכִ֥ין <S%H3559><s%> which he had prepared לֽוֹ׃

וַיֶּאֱסֹ֥ף <S%H622><s%> assembled דָּוִ֛יד <S%H1732><s%> And David אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the children אַֽהֲרֹ֖ן <S%H175><s%> of Aaron וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַלְוִיִּֽם׃ <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons קְהָ֑ת <S%H6955><s%> of Kohath אוּרִיאֵ֣ל <S%H222><s%> Uriel הַשָּׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons מְרָרִ֑י <S%H4847><s%> of Merari עֲשָׂיָ֣ה <S%H6222><s%> Asaiah הַשָּׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מָאתַ֥יִם <S%H3967><s%> two hundred וְעֶשְׂרִֽים׃ <S%H6242><s%> and twenty ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons גֵּרְשׁ֑וֹם <S%H1648><s%> Gershon יוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> Joel הַשָּׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֖יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מֵאָ֥ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וּשְׁלֹשִֽׁים׃ <S%H7970><s%> and thirty ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons אֱלִֽיצָפָ֑ן <S%H469><s%> of Elizaphan שְׁמַֽעְיָ֥ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah הַשָּׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מָאתָֽיִם׃ <S%H3967><s%> two hundred ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons חֶבְר֑וֹן <S%H2275><s%> of Hebron אֱלִיאֵ֥ל <S%H447><s%> Eliel הַשָּׂ֖ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֥יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren שְׁמוֹנִֽים׃ <S%H8084><s%> fourscore ס

לִבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> Of the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <S%H5816><s%> of Uzziel עַמִּינָדָ֣ב <S%H5992><s%> Amminadab הַשָּׂ֔ר <S%H8269><s%> the chief וְאֶחָ֕יו <S%H251><s%> and his brethren מֵאָ֖ה <S%H3967><s%> an hundred וּשְׁנֵ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> both עָשָֽׂר׃ <S%H6240><s%> ten ס

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> called דָוִ֔יד <S%H1732><s%> And David לְצָד֥וֹק <S%H6659><s%> for Zadok וּלְאֶבְיָתָ֖ר <S%H54><s%> and Abiathar הַכֹּֽהֲנִ֑ים <S%H3548><s%> the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> and for the Levites לְאֽוּרִיאֵ֤ל <S%H222><s%> for Uriel עֲשָׂיָה֙ <S%H6222><s%> Asaiah וְיוֹאֵ֣ל <S%H3100><s%> and Joel שְׁמַֽעְיָ֔ה <S%H8098><s%> Shemaiah וֶאֱלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H447><s%> and Eliel וְעַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> and Amminadab

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And said לָהֶ֔ם אַתֶּ֛ם <S%H859><s%> You רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> unto them Ye [are] the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <S%H1><s%> of the fathers לַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites הִֽתְקַדְּשׁוּ֙ <S%H6942><s%> sanctify אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you וַאֲחֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> yourselves [both] ye and your brethren וְהַֽעֲלִיתֶ֗ם <S%H5927><s%> that ye may bring up אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֤וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> that הֲכִינ֖וֹתִי <S%H3559><s%> unto [the place that] I have prepared לֽוֹ׃

כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> Because לְמַבָּרִ֥אשׁוֹנָ֖ה <S%H7223><s%> For because ye [did it] not at the first לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אַתֶּ֑ם <S%H859><s%> you פָּרַ֨ץ <S%H6555><s%> made a breach יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H430><s%> our God בָּ֔נוּ כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> Because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> did not דְרַשְׁנֻ֖הוּ <S%H1875><s%> upon us for that we sought כַּמִּשְׁפָּֽט׃ <S%H4941><s%> him not after the due order

וַיִּֽתְקַדְּשׁ֔וּ <S%H6942><s%> sanctified הַכֹּהֲנִ֖ים <S%H3548><s%> So the priests וְהַלְוִיִּ֑ם <S%H3881><s%> and the Levites לְהַעֲל֕וֹת <S%H5927><s%> themselves to bring up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲר֥וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וַיִּשְׂא֣וּ <S%H5375><s%> bare בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> And the children הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> אֲר֣וֹן <S%H727><s%> the ark הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> thereon as Moses כִּדְבַ֣ר <S%H1697><s%> according to the word יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בִּכְתֵפָ֥ם <S%H3802><s%> upon their shoulders בַּמֹּט֖וֹת <S%H4133><s%> with the staves עֲלֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5921><s%> thereon פ

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake דָּוִיד֮ <S%H1732><s%> And David לְשָׂרֵ֣י <S%H8269><s%> to the chief הַלְוִיִּם֒ <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites לְהַֽעֲמִ֗יד <S%H5975><s%> to appoint אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחֵיהֶם֙ <S%H251><s%> their brethren הַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <S%H7891><s%> [to be] the singers בִּכְלֵי־ <S%H3627><s%> with instruments שִׁ֛יר <S%H7892><s%> of musick נְבָלִ֥ים <S%H5035><s%> psalteries וְכִנֹּר֖וֹת <S%H3658><s%> and harps וּמְצִלְתָּ֑יִם <S%H4700><s%> and cymbals מַשְׁמִיעִ֥ים <S%H8085><s%> sounding לְהָרִֽים־ <S%H7311><s%> by lifting up בְּק֖וֹל <S%H6963><s%> the voice לְשִׂמְחָֽה׃ <S%H8057><s%> with joy פ

וַיַּעֲמִ֣ידוּ <S%H5975><s%> appointed הַלְוִיִּ֗ם <S%H3881><s%> So the Levites אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> הֵימָ֣ן <S%H1968><s%> Heman בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹאֵ֔ל <S%H3100><s%> of Joel וּמִ֨ן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from אֶחָ֔יו <S%H251><s%> and of his brethren אָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son בֶּֽרֶכְיָ֑הוּ <S%H1296><s%> of Berechiah ס וּמִן־ <S%H4480><s%> and from בְּנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> and of the sons מְרָרִי֙ <S%H4847><s%> of Merari אֲחֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H251><s%> their brethren אֵיתָ֖ן <S%H387><s%> Ethan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son קֽוּשָׁיָֽהוּ׃ <S%H6984><s%> of Kushaiah

וְעִמָּהֶ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> them אֲחֵיהֶ֣ם <S%H251><s%> And with them their brethren הַמִּשְׁנִ֑ים <S%H4932><s%> of the second זְכַרְיָ֡הוּ <S%H2148><s%> [degree] Zechariah בֵּ֡ן <S%H1122><s%> Ben וְיַֽעֲזִיאֵ֡ל <S%H3268><s%> and Jaaziel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֡וֹת <S%H8070><s%> and Shemiramoth וִיחִיאֵ֣ל ׀ <S%H3171><s%> and Jehiel וְעֻנִּ֡י <S%H6042><s%> and Unni אֱלִיאָ֡ב <S%H446><s%> Eliab וּבְנָיָ֡הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah וּמַֽעֲשֵׂיָ֡הוּ <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah וּמַתִּתְיָהוּ֩ <S%H4993><s%> and Mattithiah וֶאֱלִ֨יפְלֵ֜הוּ <S%H466><s%> and Elipheleh וּמִקְנֵיָ֨הוּ <S%H4737><s%> and Mikneiah וְעֹבֵ֥ד אֱדֹ֛ם <S%H5654><s%> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3273><s%> and Jeiel הַשֹּׁעֲרִֽים׃ <S%H7778><s%> the porters

וְהַמְשֹׁ֣רְרִ֔ים <S%H7891><s%> So the singers הֵימָ֥ן <S%H1968><s%> Heman אָסָ֖ף <S%H623><s%> Asaph וְאֵיתָ֑ן <S%H387><s%> and Ethan בִּמְצִלְתַּ֥יִם <S%H4700><s%> with cymbals נְחֹ֖שֶׁת <S%H5178><s%> of brass לְהַשְׁמִֽיעַ׃ <S%H8085><s%> [were appointed] to sound

וּזְכַרְיָ֨ה <S%H2148><s%> And Zechariah וַעֲזִיאֵ֜ל <S%H5815><s%> and Aziel וּשְׁמִֽירָמ֤וֹת <S%H8070><s%> and Shemiramoth וִֽיחִיאֵל֙ <S%H3171><s%> and Jehiel וְעֻנִּ֣י <S%H6042><s%> and Unni וֶֽאֱלִיאָ֔ב <S%H446><s%> and Eliab וּמַעֲשֵׂיָ֖הוּ <S%H4641><s%> and Maaseiah וּבְנָיָ֑הוּ <S%H1141><s%> and Benaiah בִּנְבָלִ֖ים <S%H5035><s%> with psalteries עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> to עֲלָמֽוֹת׃ <S%H5961><s%> on Alamoth

וּמַתִּתְיָ֣הוּ <S%H4993><s%> And Mattithiah וֶאֱלִֽיפְלֵ֗הוּ <S%H466><s%> and Elipheleh וּמִקְנֵיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H4737><s%> and Mikneiah וְעֹבֵ֣ד אֱדֹ֔ם <S%H5654><s%> and Obededom וִֽיעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H3273><s%> and Jeiel וַעֲזַזְיָ֑הוּ <S%H5812><s%> and Azaziah בְּכִנֹּר֥וֹת <S%H3658><s%> with harps עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on הַשְּׁמִינִ֖ית <S%H8067><s%> on the Sheminith לְנַצֵּֽחַ׃ <S%H5329><s%> to excel

וּכְנַנְיָ֥הוּ <S%H3663><s%> And Chenaniah שַֽׂר־ <S%H8269><s%> chief הַלְוִיִּ֖ם <S%H3881><s%> of the Levites בְּמַשָּׂ֑א <S%H4853><s%> [was] for song יָסֹר֙ <S%H3256><s%> he instructed בַּמַּשָּׂ֔א <S%H4853><s%> about the song כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> because מֵבִ֖ין <S%H995><s%> because he [was] skilful הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he
וּבֶֽרֶכְיָה֙ <S%H1296><s%> And Berechiah וְאֶלְקָנָ֔ה <S%H511><s%> and Elkanah שֹׁעֲרִ֖ים <S%H7778><s%> [were] doorkeepers לָאָרֽוֹן׃ <S%H727><s%> for the ark
